column1: Hiring Sr. SAP PS, PM & QM For Oman Work location
column2: Greetings from Krish IT Solutions!!! Immediate hiring Sr. Specialist SAP Project Systems (PS) Plant Maintenance (PM) /Quality Management (QM)        8+   years of experience in SAP Basis administration roles, with expertise in SAP   system installation, configuration, and maintenance. Minimum   of 5 years of experience in SAP implementation and support with a focus on   Project Systems, Plant Maintenance, and Quality Management modules. Experience with SAP   system monitoring, performance tuning, security administration, and disaster   recovery planning. Hands-on   experience in configuring and customizing SAP PS, PM, and QM modules to meet   business requirements. Strong   understanding of business processes in project management, maintenance   management, and quality management domains. Proficiency in SAP integration with other modules such as Materials Management (MM), Sales and Distribution (SD), and Finance (FI).  preferred immediate joiners, Eligible and interested candidates can share your cv to l.priya@krishit.com
column11: SAP PS, Sap Plant Maintenance, SAP Quality Management, Sap S Hana, SAP Project Systems
